channel.title: Monitoring on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Monitoring on TLDRBins

item.title: Zabbix
item.description: Zabbix API General # Auth with cred curl http://<DOMAIN>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H "Content-Type: application/json-rpc" -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0", "method":"user.login", "id":1, "auth":null, "params":{"user": "<USER>", "password": "<PASSWORD>"}}' # Get users curl -s http://<DOMAIN>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H "Content-Type: application/json-rpc" -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0", "method":"user.get", "id":1, "auth":"<AUTH>", "params":{"output": "extend"}}' | jq . # Get hosts curl -s http://<DOMAIN>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H "Content-Type: application/json-rpc" -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0", "method":"host.get", "id":1, "auth":"<AUTH>", "params":{}}' | jq . # Get user group info curl -s http://<DOMAIN>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H "Content-Type: application/json-rpc" -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.
